comprehensive_overview: Mashtree is a tool for constructing phylogenetic trees directly from pairwise Mash distances. It builds hierarchical trees from Mash distance matrices in Newick tree format. Mashtree provides a fast and memory-efficient method for creating phylogenetic trees based on genomic similarity.
core_features:
1. Constructs phylogenetic trees directly from pairwise Mash distances.
2. Builds hierarchical trees from Mash distance matrices in Newick tree format.
3. Fast and memory-efficient method for creating phylogenetic trees based on genomic similarity.
